title: Meditation - Flax Seed and Herb Eye Pillow
author: Name
description: This pillow is filled with flax seeds and fragrant herbs. You can use it as is, heat it in a microwave for 5-10 seconds or cool it in the freezer for different results.
cleaned_text: Ease yourself into meditation & relaxation with this eye pillow, which soothes you with the softest flannel and the scent of rosemary and lemongrass Meditation - Flax Seed and Herb Eye Pillow $12.00 This pillow is filled with flax seeds and fragrant herbs. You can use it as is, heat it in a microwave for 5-10 seconds or cool it in the freezer for different results.
